data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: It is solid but soft at room temperature, and melts easily. Its ____ is ____ pale ____, ____ can ____ from ____ yellow ____ nearly ____ depending ____ on ____ type ____ food ____ animals ____ eating. (Butter is typically paler in the winter, for example, when dairy cattle feed on stored hay rather than fresh grass).
data.partBlankContent: It is solid but soft at room temperature, and melts easily. Its co___ is gene_____ pale yel___, b__ can va__ from de__ yellow t_ nearly wh___ depending lar____ on wh__ type o_ food t__ animals we__ eating. (Butter is typically paler in the winter, for example, when dairy cattle feed on stored hay rather than fresh grass).
data.answer: 它是固体，但在室温下很软，很容易融化。它的颜色通常是淡黄色，但也可能从深黄色到接近白色，这主要取决于动物吃的食物类型。(例如，黄油在冬天通常会更白，因为奶牛吃的是储存的干草而不是新鲜的草)。
